hero_subtitle: Your Voice. Your Vote. Your Future.
hero_description: A large-scale cross-school event for political education for first-time voters in Stade.
section_what_desc: The Erstwähler Forum 2026 is a large-scale cross-school event for political education that brings together students from all participating schools in one common venue.
highlight_podium_desc: Moderated discussions on topics that affect young people.
highlight_markt_desc: Booths from parties, youth organizations, and other organizations.
team_page_desc: The organizational team of the Erstwähler Forum 2026
traeger_desc: The event is supported by the participating schools.
traeger_schulen_desc: The schools as sponsors of the event make the Erstwähler Forum possible as an approved mandatory event.
traeger_jugendringe_desc: A big thank you to the Stadtjugendring and Kreisjugendring for their support and providing facilities for the organization.
blog_desc: News and updates about the Erstwähler Forum 2026
footer_address: Erstwähler Forum '26 · c/o Jack Ruder · Harsefelder Straße 40 · 21680 Stade
unique_event: The first event of its kind — possibly in all of Germany.
